name: Raymond Lirag
text: Eh. I just thought it was an honest mistake. It would be different if the campaign had you play the zerg once or twice, but that never happens. The early challenge modes don't have zerg building bases either if I remember right    Also remember, the person who made the strip is in the same league as that guy, so I personally think it's a case of the pot calling the kettle a noob.  :D
